metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41688 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: DCMTK through 3.6.6 does not handle memory free properly. The object in theprogram is free but its address is still used in other locations. Sendingspecific requests to the dcmqrdb program will incur a double free. Anattacker can use it to launch a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: dcmtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
